decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly get a powerful creature into the graveyard using cards like Entomb and Grief, then use reanimation spells like Animate Dead and Reanimate to bring it back onto the battlefield. The deck also has counter spells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its combo pieces, along with card advantage with Brainstorm and Ponder. With a mix of disruptive creatures like Archon of Cruelty and efficient threats like Atraxa, Grand Unifier, the deck aims to control the game while setting up its combo win condition.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana through spells like Seething Song and Lotus Petal, while controlling the opponent's board with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. The deck aims to combo off with cards like Elemental Eruption and Jeska's Will to deal massive amounts of damage and win the game in a single turn. The inclusion of powerful cards like The One Ring and Lórien Revealed help to provide additional advantages and utility to stay ahead in the game. Overall, the deck focuses on explosive plays and quick wins through its combo potential.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deploy aggressive creatures and artifacts to overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. It aims to utilize cards such as Goblin Engineer and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to tutor for key pieces like Shadowspear and Entomb. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Ensnaring Bridge to control the board state. With a mix of creatures, artifacts, and fast mana sources, the Rakdos Aggro deck seeks to apply pressure early and maintain a strong presence on the battlefield.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful storm cards like Infernal Tutor and Tendrils of Agony to create a high storm count and win the game in a single turn. It also incorporates protection cards like Leyline of the Void and Veil of Summer to ensure the combo can go off without disruption. The deck contains various mana accelerants like Lion's Eye Diamond and Lotus Petal to generate the required resources to cast multiple spells in a turn. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to respond.
